title: Dont know what they were thinking
review: One person is talking and a movie track plays in the backround with sound louder than the narrater and they decide to play guitar music on top of that. I lasted about 5 mins then turned off

title: Yikes! Bad!
review:
This movie begins with a guy in jeans, a white shirt, a grey tie that is tied way too short, a blazer on which is pinned a plastic badge. That tells you the quality of this film right off the bat. It's horrible. Poorly written poorly directed poorly acted.

Early on there was a sort of hot babe typing. Wanted her to get nake. She didnt. Don't waste your time.

title: a well executed documentary..
review: Based on other reviews here, people are mistaking a beautifully executed documentary as a poorly executed narrative action film.... it is a documentary with creative recreations, animations, crime scene photos, and a magnificent sound track for a documentary.. and to that end, tells an amazing story that I never heard of. If you like a good true crime doc that this is as good as one can ask for.. it also will have you researching this story, as it did me..
